prompt: A flat color anime illustration in a retro pop style with bold, confident outlines and minimal shading. A joyful young woman with short, black bob-cut hair blowing dynamically in the wind from the right, looks upwards with a wide, beaming smile. She has blush marks and small bandage-like markings on her cheeks. She wears a traditional dark navy blue sailor school uniform (seifuku) with white trim and a red scarf tied in front. A white backpack strap is visible on her shoulder. A plume of white breath or smoke exhales from the right side. The background is a solid, plain off-white color. Clean vector art aesthetic, zero shadows.
negative_prompt: 3d render, realistic, photorealistic, detailed shading, gradient colors, volumetric lighting, complex background, low quality, bad anatomy, distorted face, messy lines
